game.name: Mini Adventre
game.description:
We have a good news for all the gamers who gave immense love to the popular platformers like Mario game! In this one of the highly addictive and engaging adventure games for kids, you have to control a small character who is mission to cover a long distance over the platform that is full of different kinds of obstacles. Move and jump him timely to avoid the obstacles and play for long! Do not forget to collect the coins on his way to boost your score.

In several instances, you have to make your character jump from one platform to another to avoid falling down in lava. Be careful friends as the dangerous monsters are also waiting for you further! He is alone, but your assistance will guide him through all the hurdles and stay alive for long. Remember the longer he alive in the game, the higher score you will be able to make in the end. Pause your game anytime whenever you want and begin playing it again to have fun!

May be you get bored after trying it for several times in your device. But, there is no need to get worried as our extensive collection of free adventure games cover almost all the popular titles in this category. Keep checking out until you meet the suitable titles that are enough to keep you glued to the screen for long! Our adventure-based platformers are designed for both boys and girls and suitable for players of all ages. Have a blast, friends, no download required to enjoy!
